document_data.name: Lady Knights of the Silver Moon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lady Knights of the Silver Moon''' were famed swordmaidens who worshiped [[Lurue]], the Unicorn Queen.<ref name="PaP-p39" >
document_data.Activities: Lady Knights adventured throughout [[Northwest Faer√ªn]] in Lurue's name. Their reputation for martial prowess rivaled that of [[Silverymoon]]'s defenders.
document_data.Possessions: These warriors wore either silver [[chainmail]], or [[elven chainmail]] if they could afford it. Their [[shield]]s were polished to a mirror shine. In combat they preferred a [[lance]] while mounted and the [[longsword]] for melee exchanges.
